name: SpeechPhone
overview: SpeechPhone LLC develops and markets hosted speech recognition based virtual assistants that unify communications and messaging through a single personal phone number. It offers Mandi, a virtual communications assistant to handle incoming calls, make calls, and allow get messages. The company also provides virtual receptionist solutions, such as SpeechPhone Soho communication solutions for the sole proprietor or small business owner to integrate calls, emails, and voice mails into one service; Speechphone Virtual Office to talk to the right person or department in a company; and Speechphone Message Service, a voice mail replacement to handle customer requests out of hours or when the user is out of the country. In addition, SpeechPhone offers SpeechPhone over IP (SoIP) to give smart dial tone and instant access to the benefits of SpeechPhone, plug SoIP device into various broadband connections, and eliminate local and long distance phone bill. Further, the company offers instant activation through the Web to add speech to various phones at www.speechphone.com or www.safetyphone.com. Its hosted speech applications enable to work from mobile phones, business phones, or VoIP phones. The companyâ€™s customers include individual subscribers, businesses, and telecom carriers in the United States and Canada. SpeechPhone has strategic partnerships with Level 3, NeoSpeech, PowerNet Global Communications, Lucent Technologies, Bell Labs, and VLM International. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Lake Forest, California.
